bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2004 to provide for funds to be distributed from the education enhancement trust fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2004 to provide for funds to be distributed from the education enhancement trust fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 11 of chapter 2 of the 2003 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION After National Board Certified Teachers, insert: Education Enhancement Personal Services $0 $0 $0 $0 Operating Expenses $2,845,271 $0 $0 $2,845,271 Total $2,845,271 $0 $0 $2,845,271 F.T.E. 0.0 Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 30 of chapter 2 of the 2003 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: Section 30. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund money from the education enhancement trust fund, the amount identified by notice of the state investment officer pursuant to § 4-5-29.2, for enhancement of state aid to general education and , state aid to special education , and education enhancement . Section 3. Any state general funds appropriated by this Act that are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2004 are reappropriated to fiscal year 2005. Section 4. This Act is effective June 14, 2004.
